tuv.seg: 0分钟到5分钟，包括5分钟，分数为零。
From zero to five minutes, inclusive, no points were given.
10分钟到15分钟，包括15分钟，得分是两分。
From ten to fifteen, inclusive, two points would be given.
25分钟到30分钟，包括30分钟，得分是五分。
All the way up to twenty-five to thirty minutes where all five points would be awarded.
5分钟到10分钟的范围，包括10分钟，得分是一分。
From five to ten minutes, inclusive, it was one point.

‘狗’的脑门霎时出现暴怒的符号。

"Just wait and see," Ling Xiao replied.

"..." The Roc's wings that had been flapping frantically were suddenly motionless.
“……原来你在鄙视和轻视我啊，罪加一等。”
"...So you have been despising and holding me in contempt ah. Your sin has risen by a grade."
“一切安好”银戈淡淡的<t0/>说道，“其实我父亲本来是打算亲自过来的，他人也已经到了北阳城，但因为突然发生一些事情，所以不得不改变计划，还望傅盟主见谅！”

"He's been well," Yin Ge said lightly, "In reality, my father had been planning to come in person. He had arrived at BeiYang City already, but because of some unexpected events, he was forced to change his plans. I hope Fu Alliance Head doesn't take offense!"
“不。”<t0/>银戈牵<t1/>着风迟云的手，“我现在的实力还不是我父亲的对手，所以我决定和迟云在外闯荡提升实力，直到我打败我父亲为止。”
"No." Yin Ge held Feng ChiYun's hand. "My current strength isn't enough to face my father, so I've decided to travel with Feng ChiYun to train and improve until I can defeat my father."
“不好！”花姑其实有在分神的注意着游咏的一举一动，见她神情有异便猜测她有后手。
"Shit!" Hua Gu was actually paying half a mind to You Yong's each and every move. Upon seeing something strange in her expression, she guessed that You Yong had a way of escape.
“不好，那家伙以前就只会欺负我。”
"No way, that guy only ever bullies me."
“不对，他之前似乎也有踢中几个人，不止十一人。”
“No, he kicked a couple of people off before as well, so it’s not just eleven.”
“不用”
"I don't need to."
“不用，我已经有安排了。”男人挥了下手，“你下去吧。”
"No need, I've already made arrangements." The man waved a hand. "You're dismissed."
“不要闹事，这里可是苍盟的地盘。”老者的声音在他耳边淡淡的响起。
"Don't make a fuss, this is the Cang Association's territory." The elderly man's voice faintly resounded beside his ears.
“不该不经你的同意就用湖里的灵水。”
"I should not have used the spiritual water in the lake without your permission."
“不该鄙视和轻视你。”
"I should not have despised and held you in contempt."
“不说话我就当你同意了，那我去叫凌霄进来，让他用麒麟神火烤，一定会很美味的。”说完他就作势要离开空间。

"If you don't speak, I'll take your silence as agreement. In that case, I'll call Ling Xiao to come in and ask him to use his Qilin Godfire to roast you. You'd definitely be extremely delicious." With that, he got ready (作势) to leave his dimension.
“不过三次挑战必须使用一次，否则视违规，要扣一个积分。”
"However, you have to use at least one of your three challenges, otherwise you break the rules, resulting in one pint being deducted."
“不过你也算是天狗的少主，如果天狗的成员都是这么变态的家伙，那么他们会听命于你吗？”游小默灵光一闪。

"however, you can also be considered at the young master of the Tiangous. If all the members of Tiangou are such abnormal/perverted guys, then will they obey your orders?" Inspiration struck You XiaoMo.
“不错，不过你别想骗本域主，你在传音石上做了手脚以为我不知道，其实你根本就没有同伙！”星<t0/>罗城主<t1/>冷笑道。

"That's right, but don't think you can trick me. Don't think I don't know you did something to your transmission stone, in reality you don't have an accomplice!" The City Master of Starfall City laughed coldly.
“两位客人是第一次来吧？”客栈的老板瞧见对方陌生的脸孔立刻猜到了。
""Is this the first time that you two are here?" The boss of the tavern (客栈) immediately guessed upon seeing their unfamiliar faces.
“为什么不是你母亲？”
"Why couldn't it be from your mother?"
“为什么？”
"Why?"
“为什么？”游小默又问。
"Why?" You XiaoMo asked.
“为父听说你昨天一直让人打听顶级灵草的事情，而且找的还是不同成长阶段的灵草，这件事可是真的？”

"Father has heard that you were continuously asking people to inquire about pinnacle level magic herbs yesterday. Furthermore, what you were looking for were magic herbs of different growth stages. Is this rumor true?"
“九头蛇皇之子怎么会跟他人一起？”游震天犀利的目光扫了<t0/>银戈一眼<t1/>，眼中埋着惊讶，淡淡的道。
"Why would the son of the Nine Headed Snake King be with them?" You ZhenTian's sharp gaze swept over Yin Ge. His eyes hid surprise as he spoke calmly.
“事情是这样的……其实我也不知道。”
"Things happened like this... ...as a matter of fact, I also don't know."
“五长老，您怎么看？”坐在冬<t0/>霖<t1/>旁边的叶导师开口说道。
“Fifth Elder, what do you think?” Mentor Ye, who was sitting next to Dong Lin, asked.
“人家根本不理你，真是有够丢人的！”
"Other people are totally ignoring you. This is truly shameful!"
“什么”
"What?"
“什么事？”
"What is it?"
“什么人？”
"Who is it?"
“他们是我朋友。”<t0/>银戈冷淡<t1/>地回道，要不是游震天身份特殊，他连一个字都不想回他。
"They're my friends." Yin Ge replied coldly. If it wasn't for You ZhenTian's special position, he wouldn't have spoken a word.
“他刚刚将十一人踢下擂台，这么说他已经得到两分了，这是混战的最高分吧？”
“He just kicked eleven people off the arena, that means he’s obtained two points. That’s the highest score so far, right?”
“他好厉害啊！”
“Holy crap he’s strong!”
“他应该还在这里，你立刻带人找一找。”唐中华没有太大的意外，那个人的速度不错，实力似乎和他不相上下，而且是有备而来，恐怕没那么容易抓到。

"He should still be here. Immediately dispatch people to look for him." Tang ZhongHua was not too surprised with his answer. That person was quite fast and his strength seemed to be comparable to his. Furthermore, the thief was well prepared, so he would probably not be caught so easily.
“他既然不顾我的死活，不仁不义，那就不要怪我无情，我跟他之间有联系，可以约他到一个地方见面。”
"If he doesn't care about my life, refusing to help me, then don't blame me for being cruel. I have a way to contact him, and can get him to meet up with me."
“他是游青云，游震天的二孙子，据说是赤血家族年轻一辈最厉害的人，他应该才是游震天真正宠爱的孙子，听闻游震天对他的要求非常严格，是不是听他去出危险的任务，所以很多人才会以为游震天不喜欢这个孙子。”对赤血家族的成员非常了解的凌霄见他在看游青云便解释道。

"He is You AingYun, You ZhenTian's second grandson. It's said that he's the most powerful amongst the younger generation of the Vermillion Blood Clan. He should be the grandson that You ZhenTian truly dotes on. I've heard that You ZhenTian's demands towards him are very strict, and would often assign dangerous missions to him, so many assumed that You ZhenTian did not like this grandson." Ling Xiao, who understood the members of the Vermillion Blood Clan extremely well, explained when he saw him watching You QingYun.
“他现在怎么样了？”游小默插入两人中间，看着木讷的风迟云，忍不住伸出手戳了戳他的脸颊，随机关心的问道。
"How is he now?" You XiaoMo inserted himself between the two. Looking at the wooden Feng ChiYun, he could not help but stretch out his hand to poke his cheek as he randomly (随机) asked in concern.
“他的红卡到底是怎么来的？”柴正恨恨的说道。
“Where did he get that red card?” Chai Zheng muttered as he seethed.
“何事？”
"What is it?"
“你——”青年气急。
"You - -" The youth saw red.
“你——”麟昊武怒指着他，眼睛却瞪着凌霄：“不要以为你朋友是麒麟族就可以在本少爷面前嚣张，惹恼了我，就算他回到麒麟族，我也有办法让他在麒麟族过不下去。”

"You - " Lin HaoWu pointed at him in fury, yet his eyes were staring at Ling Xiao. "Don't think that you can run rampant in front of this young master just because your friend is from the Qilin Clan. If you offend me, I still have ways to make his life difficult even if he returns back to the Qilin Clan."
“你不用帮他说好话。”
"Don't speak for him."
“你们不用担心，我不介意，就这样，我先走了。”
"Don't worry, I don't mind. Alright, I'll be leaving now."
“你们准备去哪里，回西境吗？”分手之前，游小默随口问道，自从风迟云救出来后，他牵挂的事情又少了一件，整个人轻松了不少。
"Where are you two going? Back to XiJing?" Before they parted, You XiaoMo asked casually. After saving Feng ChiYun, another burden had been lifted off his shoulders and he felt much lighter.
“你们在这里做什么？”
“What are you guys doing here?”
“你们有多少？”
"How much do you have?"
“你倒是聪明。”凌霄说道。
"Contary to expectations, you are quite smart." Ling Xiao said.
“你别问那么多，我在星罗城的城主府，十万火急啊！”
"Don't ask so much. I'm in Starfall City's City Master estate, it's an emergency!"
“你听错了。”凌霄面无表情的说道，“刚刚只有有只狗在叫而已，不用理它。”
"You got it wrong." Ling Xiao expressionlessly replied, "It was just a dog barking just now, there's no need to bother about it."
“你在犹豫什么？”
"What are you hesitating for?"
“你帮我看看，看完再告诉我。”游小默坚定的回道。
"You help me take a look. Tell me after you've finished looking." You XiaoMo firmly replied.
“你撒谎。”男人轻描淡写的道，“最后一句是真的，但前面都是假的吧，那十人明明问的是将你送到村子的青年的事情，老头，都这么大岁数了，撒谎可不好。”

"You're lying." The man mildly commented, "The last sentence is true, but the front part is all false. Those ten people were clearly asking about the youth who sent you to the village. Old fellow, you're already a fully-fledged adult, it's not good to lie."
“你是在眶我吗？”银戈不悦地道。
"Are you trying to frame (眶) me?" Yin Ge asked in displeasure.
“你来了。”
"You're here."
“你真的没见过天狗的成员？”游小默赶忙问道。
"You've really never seen any members of the Tiangou?" You XiaoMo hastily asked.
“你笑什么？”游小默皱起眉，<t0/>魔音脑脑<t1/>的笑声。
"What are you laughing at?" You XiaoMo frowned at this strange laughter.
“你笑什么？”雷老不悦的道。
"What are you smiling at?" Old Lei snapped in displeasure.
“你笑什么？”麟昊武被他笑得怒火越来越大。
"What are you laughing for?" Lin HaoWu's rage was burning brighter and brighter from being laughed at.
“你管我在笑什么。”申老头眉毛一扬。
"Why do you care about what I'm smiling about." Geezer Shen raised an eyebrow.
“你若不愿意，那便算了，我可不想无缘无故惹一身骚。”银戈作势要走。
"We can forget it if you're not willing . I don't wish to attract a whole lot of trouble for no reason." Yin Ge turned and was about to walk away.
“你要干什么？”翁公警惕了起来。
"What are you going to do with the information?" Weng Gong was wary.
“你要试也可以，试不成，我们再来商量则呢么把元素之心抢到手。”
"You can try it if you want. If you fail, we can then discuss about how we should snatch the Elemental Essence."
“你说什么，还要付一个积分？”
"What did you say? We have to pay a point?"
“你说什么？”男子目光寒光。
"What did you say?" The man's gaze went cold.
“你说谁有病？”麟昊武嚯的站起来。
"Who did you say is sick?!" Lin HaoWu stood up.
“你说那滴精血？”云少表情凝重起来，那是他好不容易才换来的东西，一直不舍得用，现在药他就这样拿出来，他有些不舍得。

"You're speaking of that drop of blood essence?" Yun Shao's expression became grave. That was something that he had gained in exchange after much difficulty and was always reluctant to use it. He was somewhat hesitant to just take it out in this manner now.
“你这个混蛋，竟然敢骗我。”
"You bastard, you actually dared to deceive me!"
“你这是什么意思？
"What do you mean?
“你这是要去哪里？”天心见他一副要外出的样子，便问道。
"Where are you going?" Tian Xin asked, seeing that he seemed to intend to head out.
“你都听到了？”翁公还以为他是突然出现的，没想到他竟然在他们说话的时候就已经在了。
"You heard everything?" Weng Gong had assumed that the man had abruptly appeared. Never did he expect him to have been present while they were speaking.
“你错哪了？”
"Where did you go wrong?"
“做什么？”
"What?"
“傅盟主，赤血家族有一名弟子失踪了，老夫想请你让弟子们帮满找一下。”
"Alliance Head Fu, a disciple of the ChiXue Family had gone missing. I was wondering if your students could help look for him?"
“公子，实<t0/>不<t1/>相瞒，我们胡村的灵草都是清风门预定的，如果我们卖给你，日后清风门找上门来，胡村恐怕会多灾多难。”

"I must inform you, that the magic herbs of our Hu Village have been reserved by the QingFeng Sect. If we sell it to you, I'm afraid that after the QingFeng Sect come calling, our villagers will be in trouble."
“关于你体内的母<t0/>蛊<t1/>……”<t2/>银戈将<t3/>凌霄的话简单的说了一遍给他听，怕风迟云不愿意，他有意强调了某些字眼。
"About the female gu within your body..." Yin Ge explained what Ling Xiao had told him to Feng ChiYun in brief. Afraid that Feng ChiYun might be unwilling, he purposefully twisted a few words.
“关于第二轮比赛，大家已经知道了，在我身后便是接下来你们要测试的重力屋，等一下老夫会让人给你们每人发放一颗传送石，当你们之中有人承受不了重力时，只要轻轻的捏碎传送石就能传送出来。”五长老看着众人说道。

“Now you all know about the second round. Behind me lies the Gravity Room where the competition will occur. In a moment, I will give you each a transport stone. If you are unable to take the gravitational force inside, you simply have to crush the stone and you will be transported out,” the Fifth Elder informed them.
“其实这件事说来话长……”
"Actually, this is a long story... ..."
“凌霄，你说他叫什么名字好？”
"Ling Xiao, what do you think it should be called?"
“凡是不是绝对的，如果有缘分的话，四灵帝王兽与人类订立本命契约也不是不可能的。”
"Not all things are absolute. If it is fated, the Four Divine Emperor Beasts setting up a lifebound contract with humans is not impossible.
“利用这只蛊可以控制风迟云的行动，所以我们怀疑这只是母蛊，风迟云体内那只应该是子蛊，不过我们用了很多种办法吧子蛊引出来，动静太大，子蛊会不安，反会对宿体造成生命威胁。”展雨轩解释道。

"You can control Feng ChiYun's actions by using this Gu. So we suspect that this is the mother Gu and the one inside Feng ChiYun's body should be the child Gu. However, we have tried countless methods to draw it out to no avail. If there's too much activity (动静), the child Gu will feel uneasy and this would be life-threatening for the host." Zhan YuXuan explained.
“别哭，他不喜欢你是他的损失，你可是驭兽工会的天心大小姐，追你的人多的是，我们不能让别人看不起是不是？”
"Don't cry. It's his loss if he doesn't like you. You're Lady Tian Xin of the Beast Transfiguration Guild. There are plenty of people pursuing you. You can't let others see you like this, no?"
“别忘了，他们以前是很要好的朋友，或许只是闹别扭。”凌霄冲他露出一抹诡笑。
"Don't forget, they were close friends in the past. Perhaps they were only being purposefully quarrelsome." Ling Xiao directed a smirk at him.
“十万火急？
"An emergency?
“十天前？”男人忽然道，“他叫什么名宇，当时穿什么衣服，长什么样，身边有没有小动物出现？”
"Ten days ago?" The man suddenly injected, "What is his name? What kind of clothes were he wearing at the time? How did he look like? Were there any small animals around him?"
“原来是……你啊，请问你有什么事吗？”游小默尴尬地笑了笑，他隐约记起来了，但是已经忘记她的长相，不过那时她应该还只是一名<t0/>五级丹师吧<t1/>。

“Oh, so it’s…you. Is there anything you want?” You XiaoMo smiled with a hint of awkwardness. He vaguely recalled that incident, but had forgotten her appearance. At that time, she was probably still a level five mage.
“原来这就是你的计划。”
"So that was your plan."
“去你的空间。”凌霄突然说道。
"Let's go to your dimension," Ling Xiao suddenly suggested.
“双鱼酒楼好像有几位管事，像武成和这个胖子，应该都是管事的儿子，难免嚣张。”凌霄也不是很清楚。
ShuangYu Hotel seems to have several directors, of which Wu Cheng and this fat kid are both sons of. It's normal that they'd be arrogant." Ling Xiao wasn't very clear on it either.
“双鱼酒楼有很多少爷吗？”游小默好奇的问道。
"Does the ShuangYu Hotel have many young masters?" You XiaoMo asked curiously.
“只要是被种下母蛊的人，除了被控制，他的修为还会被母蛊一点一点的吞噬掉，而母蛊会将吞噬而来的修为通过连心转化给公蛊，最后他们的主人便可以通过公蛊将修为据为己有，当修为被吞噬得一干二净后，母蛊会继续吞噬宿主的生命力，知道宿主死亡为止。”

"Other than being controlled, a person implanted with the female Gu will have their cultivation slowly devoured by it. The female Gu will pass on (转化) the cultivation it swallowed to the male Gu through the heart link. Finally, their master is able to forcefully take possession of the cultivation as their own through the male Gu. When the cultivation is completely swallowed up, the female Gu will continue to devour the vitality of the host until the host is dead."
“叫我天心就好了。”听到游小默叫自己，天心立刻转阴为晴，含情脉脉的看着他。
"Just call me Tian Xin." Hearing You XiaoMo address her, Tian Xin's mood immediately rose, looking at the other with adoration.
“可以。”
"Of course."
“可是，赤血家族要是追究起来怎么办，当时她闹的动静可不小，看到的人很多。”男人有些犹豫。
"However, what should we do if the Vermilion Blood Clan investigates this? She stirred up a big disturbance at that time and there were many people who saw it." The man was somewhat hesitant.
“后果便是输，输了要降到下面的楼层。”
"It counts as a loss. If you lose, then you'll be moved to a lower level."
“听说什么？”游小默愣了一下。
"Heard of what?" You XiaoMo was confused.
“呃……”游小默不知道怎么回答他这个问题。
“Uh…” You XiaoMo had no idea how to respond.
“呃，我和程向荣只是路过而已。”颜辉急忙撇清关系。
"Er, Cheng XiangRong and I just passed by, that's all," Yan Hui hurried to find an excuse for them.
“呦，好风景！”
"Oh, what a nice view!"
“呵呵，麒麟族和妖凰族每次见面总是这么热闹。”
"Hehe, every time I see the Qilin Clan and the Demon Phoenix Clan, they're always so lively."
“呵，这个时候就承认是我夫人？”凌霄发出意义不明的笑声。
"Heh, so now you admit you're my wife?" Ling Xiao gave a ambiguous laugh.
"Eh?"
"Ha?
“哦。”龙血发出类似恍然大悟般的声音，“也不是不行，不过你想抵哪条过错？”
"Oh." The dragon blood let out a sound as if he had suddenly seen the light, "It's not impossible, but which mistake do you want to atone for?"
“唐先生，您怎么会在这里？”
"Sir Tang, may I known why are you here?"
“唔，拍不到也没关系。”凌霄突然说道。
"Oh. It's okay even if you can't get it." Ling Xiao suddenly injected.
"Ah!"
“嗯。”凌霄应道。
"En." Ling Xiao acknowledged.
“嘎嘎嘎！
"Ga ga ga!
“城主，他们往西面跑过去了。”一名守卫队长跑过来报告。

Now, the Teng family had been wiped out, but the Chai family had four still standing.
瓦片这种东西得轻拿轻放，不然<t0/>稍微碰撞就会发出声响，在寂静的夜里声音还会扩大几倍。
Things like tiles had to be gently handled, otherwise it would make a sound with just a slight collision and the sound would be magnified several times in the silent night.
由于淬炼的灵草数量比较多，游小默比平时要小心一些，因此多花了一些时间，反复淬炼了四次，时间只过去了一个时辰，若是平时，他估计还要再花半个时辰才能完成。

You XiaoMo had to be more careful than usual since there was a larger number of herbs being distilled, so it took him more time, too. By the time he repeated his distillation for the fourth time, only an hour had passed. Usually, he would need another half hour to finish.
由于滕家与柴家有实力的都败了，所以他们的空缺就被其他人填上，有的甚至是排名在五十名之后的。
Since the Teng and Chai families were wiped out, the spaces left by them were filled in by others, even some who didn’t rank in the top fifty.
男人望着某个方向灿烂的笑起来，虽然没有名字，但他已经确信。
The man gazed into the distance with a brilliant smile. He was already convinced although he did not have a name.
男人知道，谜团和他们口中的青年有关。
The man knew that the enigma (谜团) was related to the youth they mentioned.
男人笑着反问道：“这就是你对待救命恩人的态度？”
The man smiled and asked in reply, "Is this the attitude you have towards your savior?"
男人问了自己比较感兴趣的问题。
The man asked about what he was more interested in.
男子割开麻袋的绳索，一颗年轻靓丽的脑袋露了出来。
The man cut the rope tying the sack closed, revealing a young and beautiful head.
男子嘴角勾起一抹狂傲，“好了，是选择留下一只手和一条腿，还是把命交代在这里，选吧。”
The corner of the man's mouth curled up in conceit. "Alright now, would you rather left an arm and leg here or die. Choose."
男子气质略微斯文，但长相偏向阴柔，特别是那双丹凤眼，生生的破坏了脸上仅剩的一丝阳刚之气，气质被拉低了很多，和独眼<t0/>刀疤那<t1/>张粗犷的<t2/>脸完全<t3/>相反，让人不得不怀疑，他们俩真的是亲兄弟吗？

The man had an air of sophistication about him, but his features were on the softer side, especially his slanted eyes that destroyed what trace of hard masculinity that remained. This ruined his image. He was the complete opposite of One-Eyed Scarface's fierce looking face. It really made people wonder, were they actually brothers?
男子缓缓的道：“你与独眼的恩怨我不管，但是但敢打伤我哥哥，就这么让你走了，我的面子要往哪里放，放了你也可以，我哥哥的伤有多重，你便加倍还吧。”

The man slowly said, "I don't care about what personal grudge you and One-Eye have, but you dared to injure my brother. If I just let you go, then I'd lose face. I can let you go, but you'll have to pay double for whatever you've done to my brother."
男执事说：“没说不代表没有。”
The male manager said, "Just because it wasn't said doesn't it it doesn't exist."
画面仿佛一下子定格了。
The scene seemed to have frozen all at once.
番茄汁？
Tomato sauce?
白天加晚上，游小默被禁欲了一个多月的凌霄做到下不了床，隔天腿还在打颤，某人还不许他用灵水去除疲劳。

For a full day and night, Ling Xiao, who had been forced into abstinence for a over month, made sure You XiaoMo wasn't able to get off the bed. His legs were still shaking the day after, and a certain someone refused to let him use spiritual water to relieve his exhaustion.
白衣人最终还是没有被放出来，虽然他看起来和赤血家族有仇，但游小默一想到他被关进禁地的理由，他就特别不想放他自由。

The white robed man did not get released in the end. Although he seemed to have a grudge with the Vermilion Blood Clan, once You XiaoMo thought of the reason he had been imprisoned in the forbidden area, he particularly did not wish to free him.
白骨小镇不大，每天进出小镇的人却只多不少，这些人大多是化形妖兽。
The White Bone Town was small, yet there were a lot of people entering and leaving town everyday. Most of these people were transformed demon beasts (化形妖兽).
百里小鱼跑了回去，得意的说道：“是我让越<t0/>煦<t1/>哥去小默的哦。”
BaiLi XiaoYu ran back, saying with triumph, “I was the one who got brother YueXu to go and find You XiaoMo!”
目前，游小默只能做到一心两用。
For now, You XiaoMo could only split his attention between two tasks.
目送她离开，游小默皱眉对猫球说道：“小猫球，你说她真的是来找我买容颜丹的吗，我怎么觉得她奇奇怪怪的。”
After watching her leave, You XiaoMo frowned a little and turned to CatQiu. “CatQiu, do you think she was really here just to buy beauty pills? I think she’s a little strange.”
相较于其他人一脸愕然，他们的表情却很自然，这就是走后门的好处，早一天知道就能先坐准备。
Their expressions were quite natural compared to the rest who were stunned. This was the advantage of getting in by the back door since they could make preparations by knowing of this a day earlier.
看到一道即将消失在夜色中的黑影，唐中华二话不说便追了过去。
Seeing a shadow that was about to disappear into the night, Tang ZhongHua chased after it without demur.
看到他的表情，冬<t0/>霖<t1/>罕见地露出一丝淡淡的笑意，“不相信的话，你们尽管看下去，他应该会给我们一个惊喜。”
Seeing their expressions, an uncharacteristic smile appeared on Dong Lin’s face. “If you don’t believe me, just watch, I bet he’ll surprise you all.”
看到他，傅苍穹脑海里霎时闪过一道身影，实在是太像了。
Seeing him, a thought flashed through Fu CangWan's mind. They were really too alike.
看到这一幕，众人的表情变得十分古怪。
Seeing this, everyone's expressions twisted.
看来凌霄在生气……
It seemed that Ling Xiao was angry...
看来这位小哥也是个不好惹的人，在打掉独眼刀疤的大刀后，竟然幻化了一把一模一样的大刀，连刀柄也是一样的，是准备气死他吗？

It seemed like this young man wasn't someone who you wanted to get on the bad side of. After disarming One-Eyed Scarface of his sword, the other had conjured an identical sword, even down to the hilt. Was the other trying to cause him to explode with anger?
看着九玄铁在火焰的煅烧下渐渐的融化，五个囚犯眼中皆闪过一丝疯狂，那是对自由的渴望和向往，他们被关在这里<t0/>太久太久<t1/>了，就到他们的意志快要被磨灭，以为自己此生只能呆在这里。

Seeing the nine myth steel slowly melt under the flames, a hint of crazed delight flashed through the eyes of the five prisoners. It was a mad desire for freedom. They had been trapped here for far too long. Their sanity was eroding, believing that they might spend their lifetime here.
看着他匆匆忙忙的离开，颜辉摸了摸脑袋，“这么着急，该不会是凌默要回来了，所以他准备亲自去接吧，要不我们偷偷的跟过去看看？”

Seeing him hurry off, Yan Hui scratched his head. "He's in quite the rush. Could it be that Ling Mo is coming back so he wants to personally welcome the other back? How about we tail him secretly and go see?"
看着走到他面前的女人，游小默微微<t0/>一诧<t1/>。
As he watched her walk towards him, he startled very slightly.
真是看不出来，两人似乎都是第一次。
He never would've expected it, but it seemed that they were both virgins.
眼下滕家和柴家准备合力对付凌霄，这种手段虽然有些卑鄙，但是混战之中，这种情况也是常见的，只是可惜了这样的好苗子。
Now the Teng and Chai families were preparing to gang up on Ling Xiao. Though this was a very dirty move to make, it was common in a free-for-all. Too bad for this talent.
眼前这名老者可是真正站在通天大陆顶端的强者，就算姬凤他们有族人在背后撑腰，他们也不可能得罪游震天。
This elderly man before their eyes was genuinely a pinnacle powerhouse in the TongTian Continent, even if Ji Feng and the rest had their clans backing them, they also could not offend You ZhenTian.
眼看着长刀就要将游小默砍成两半，一些胆小的人吓得捂住了眼睛，人群<t0/>中看着<t1/>这一幕的小黑几人，心脏都差点跳出来。

Seeing the sword about to split You XiaoMo in half, some more squeamish people covered their eyes in fright. XiaoHei and the others who were watching from the crowd felt like their hearts were going to jump out of their chests.
瞥了他一眼。
Ling Xiao shot a glance at him.
确定四下无人，凌霄才将游小默放下来。
After confirming that there was no one around, Ling Xiao set You XiaoMo down.
确定是这家酒楼后，游小默抬脚走了进去。
After making sure he was in the right place, You XiaoMo walked inside.
磅礴的灵气在独眼刀疤面前形成一面障壁，下一秒，灵魂之力形成的大刀便狠狠的落在障壁上，风暴疯狂的席卷着，地上的沙尘都被刮起来，几乎令人睁不开眼睛，看样子似乎势均力敌。

Majestic spiritual energy formed a barrier in front of One-Eyed Scarface. In the next moment, the sword made of soul force descended harshly onto the barrier. It caused the air to whirl around wildly, picking up the dust and sand on the ground and making it near impossible for everyone to keep their eyes open. It seemed that the two forces were equal in strength.
离别的岔口，卫白抓起游小默的手，“这一别不知道多少年才能见到，如果可以，我希望……”
At the junction where they were to part, Wei Bai grasped You XiaoMo's hand, “I don’t know how many years it'll be before we can see each other again. If it's possible, I hope...”
离开空间后，两人便直奔通往第十层的楼梯，正当他们要走上去的时候，上面突然传来一道冰冷的呵斥声，夹着一丝令人压抑的威压。
After leaving the dimension, the two headed straight for the stairs to the tenth floor. As they were about to go up, a coldly reproachful voice rang out, along with a suffocating spiritual pressure.
离开空间后，游小默一不小心掉在凌霄身上。
You XiaoMo dropped onto Ling Xiao in a moment of carelessness after leaving the dimension.
离开西面之前，游小默将高马远的人头交给了翁公。
Before leaving the west, You XiaoMo handed Gao Mayuan's head to Wen Gong.
秀<t0/>眉轻皱<t1/>了一下，滕梓心又问道：“叶长老，如果时间超过半个小时，那又要如何算，也是五分吗？”
Her sleek eyebrows furrowed, and Teng ZiXin asked, “Elder Ye, what if we manage more than half an hour. Is it still five points?”
程向荣正准备回自己房间，听到这句话便皱起眉，“这是他的隐私，你怎么可以说这种话。”
Cheng XiangRong was prepared to return to his room and frowned upon hearing this. "This is his personal business, you can't suggest something like that."
程向荣说：“这种事以后还是少开玩笑比较好，不然被听到会给他留下不好的印象。”
Cheng XiangRong said, "In the future, you shouldn't joke about something like that, otherwise it wouldn't be good if you're overheard."
程荷一斤刚开始介绍，“这是丹师工会拿出来的火系元素之心，它的价值我就不多说了，相信在座的各位都听说过，丹师工会只有一个要求，只有在场的诸位能拿出令丹师工会心动的东西即可得到它。”

Cheng He began to introduce, "This is the Fire Elemental Essence put up by the Mage Association. I believe that everyone here has heard of it before and will not say much about it's value. The Mage Association only has one request, as long as the Ladies and Gentlemen present are able to take out something that would move the Mage Association, that person would be able to get the Fire Elemental Essence."
程荷仿佛早就猜到这种情况，表情不变的说道：“丹方的主人只有一个要求，他要一枚一品彩丹和一枚二品彩丹。”

Cheng He announced with an unchanged expression as if she had long expected this situation, "The owner of the pill recipe only has one request. He wants a first grade rainbow pill and a second grade rainbow pill."
程荷拿起卷轴，似猜到大家心里在想什么，淡淡一笑：“各位或许以为这是顶级功法或技法，但是很抱歉的告诉大家，这卷卷轴不是功法也不是技法，不过我可以保证，它的价值不会差顶级功法多少……”

Cheng He picked the scroll up and she gave a faint smile, as if she had guessed what everyone was thinking in their minds, "Everyone present may be thinking that this is a pinnacle level soul training or skill training manual, but I'm very sorry to say that this scroll is neither a soul training or skill training manual. Yet, I can guarantee that its value will not be any less than a pinnacle level soul training manual..."
程荷看到大部分人露出垂涎的表情，丹师眼神却又透出一丝无奈，就知道他们都放弃了，平时确实也是这种情况，但今天似乎多了两个强而有力的竞争者，思及此，她分别朝游小默和云少的方向看了一眼。

Cheng He saw that although most were drooling at the mouth, the eyes of the mages showed a hint of helplessness and she knew that they had given up. This was usually the case, but today there seemed to be two strong and powerful competitors. Thinking about this, she separately looked in the direction of You XiaoMo and Yun Shao.
程荷知道他们身家亦不菲，但要拿得出足以匹配火元素之心的东西却差得不少，所以她也没有失望，目光投向游小默和云少，这两个财大气粗的人还没出手，她很有兴趣看看他们到底能拿出什么宝贝来。

Cheng He knew that though they had a high family background (身家亦不菲), it was difficult to take out something that matched (却差得不少) the Fire Elemental Essence, thus she was not disappointed. Her gaze cast towards You XiaoMo and Yun Shao. These two rich and imposing people have not yet shown their hand. She was very interested to see what kind of treasure they would be able to take out.
程荷笑着让人把最后一件压轴拿上来，原本热烈讨论的人霎时安静了下来，一个个都顶着黑布下的东西。

Cheng He smiled as she asked an attendant to bring the last item out. Everyone who had been enthusiastically discussing fell silent in a split second, as each and every one of them eyed the item beneath the black cloth.
程荷走上前亲自掀开盖着第一件物品的黑布，黑布下，赫然躺着一卷描绘着蓝色纹路的卷轴。
Cheng He stepped forward and personally removed the black cloth covering the first item. Beneath the black cloth was a scroll with a blue veined pattern.
空间符的价值太高，冲着它是圣境强者制作这一点就只高不低，若一直<t0/>花灵晶或<t1/>灵丹去买，将会是一笔极大的花销，还不如自己制作。

Teleportation talismans were too expensive. Just the fact that only Sacred Level elites could make them meant that they would only be expensive. If they always bought them with spirit gems and pills, then that would be too much of an expenditure. Better to make them themselves.
空间里。
Inside the dimension.
站在台阶上的凌霄居高临下的扫视一圈，见大家蠢蠢欲动，手指一弹，一缕红色的火焰瞬时出现在大家面前，通道的温度骤然上升可许多。

Ling Xiao, standing on the steps, swept his gaze over everyone from where he stood high above them. Seeing everyone itching to fight, he flicked his finger and a red flame suddenly appeared in front of everyone. The temperature in the hall rose dramatically.

第一次遇到这种情况，程荷也为难起来，她请来中庭交易会最好的鉴定师出来，在对方检验过后，得出的结果却是差不多，这下子就难办了。

It was her first time encountering this situation and Cheng He felt awkward. She invited the best appraisal master at the Courtyard Trade Fair over and after the other party's assessment, the result was that the quality of the pills were nearly the same. This would be hard to deal with now.
第九层没有第八层大，囚牢也只有十个，其中五个有人，这些人的实力两个是神境，其余三人是地境，囚牢就想五星级酒楼一样豪华，不过囚住要他们的牢笼却是世界上最坚硬的铁块铸成的。

The ninth floor wasn't as large as the eights, and there were only ten prison cells, with five prisoners in total. Two of the prisoners wer Divine level, and the other three were Earth level. The prisons were as extravagant as a five star hotel, but the bars were made from the strongest kind of steel in this world.
第二件压轴物只是一本顶级功法。
The second item was a pinnacle level soul training manual.
第二次来，凌霄也是提前通知对方。
The second time he came, Ling Xiao had also notified the other party in advance.
第二轮比赛名为重力屋测试。
The second round was called the Gravity Room.
等他们赶到的时候，银戈和展雨轩正围着风迟云发愁。
Yin Ge and Zhan Yu Xuan were surrounding Feng ChiYun while fretting when they arrived.
等他想再找的时候，茫茫人海，对方板有可能已经不在通天大陆，他要去哪里找？

There was a vast sea of people to comb through when he wanted to find You XiaoMo's father again.,In addition, the other party may have long left the TongTian Continent. From where should be even begin to look?
等他抬头，就看到凌霄的脸竟然恢复了真容，而且变得红通通一片，<t0/>隐隐还<t1/>透着一丝扭曲，猛地推开游小默，盘起腿原地坐下，一句话也不说就闭起眼睛。

When he raised his head, he saw that Ling Xiao's face had returned to its true form and a flush had spread across the other's cheeks, expression twisting a little. He hurriedly pushed You XiaoMo aside, crossing his legs as he sat down. He closed his eyes, not saying a word.
等他脱险后，他<t0/>一<t1/>定向凌霄忏悔。
After he got out of this, he would beg for Ling Xiao's forgiveness.
等凌霄和游小默出来后，十层的出入口已经被堵得水泄不通，八九层的守卫者几乎都聚集在这里了，为首的是游单两兄弟。

After Ling Xiao and You XiaoMo came out, they found that the entrance to the tenth floor had been completely blocked off. It seemed that all the guards of the eighth and ninth floors had gathered here with You Dan and his brother at the front.
等宴会结束后，他们想查出是谁带走风迟云也不大可能，因为中途离开会场的人并不少，一些急着赶路的人也是在中途就离开绵绵山的，赤血家族要追究起来并不容易，而且风迟云的情况也不能暴露出去。

Even if they wanted to find out who had brought Feng ChiYun away when the banquet was over, it was impossible. There were many who had left the banquet midway and a few people who had to hurry on their journey also left the continuous mountain in the middle of the banquet. It was not easy for the Vermilion Blood Clan to investigate all of them. Furthermore, they could not disclose Feng ChiYun's circumstances.
糙汉轻蔑的冷笑一声。
The burly man sneered in disdain.
紧接着有几个人跑了进来，有人立刻认出带头走进来的人，他就是游青云的弟弟游青山，游青山看到游震天，立刻喊了一声‘爷爷’。

Then, several people ran inside. Some people immediately recognized the one in the lead. He was You QingYun's younger brother, You QingShan. When You QingShan saw You ZhenTian, he immediately called out, "Grandfather!"
紧随其后是赤血家族的子弟，其中就有在六月山脉与游小默见过面的游青山，还有一些他不认识的人，不过让游小默比较在意的是，赤血家族的人似乎对走在游青山身边的男子很恭敬。

Following closely behind were the younger generations of the Vermillion Blood Clan. Included among them was You QingShan who You XiaoMo had met in the June Mountains, and there were also some who he did not recognise. However, what You XiaoMo was more concerned about was that the Vermillion Blood Clan members seemed to be very deferential to the man walking beside You QingShan.
红卡在乙级学区或许没有太大的作用，但那是因为一些需要红卡才能进入的地方都在甲级学区，可是游小默还没去甲级学区就拥有一张红卡。

The red card didn’t have much use in Ward B, but that was because the places that could only be accessed by a red card were all in Ward A. Yet You XiaoMo hadn’t even gotten into Ward A yet and he already had one.
红色的玉简，此刻就像一块普通玉简摊在凌霄手里，只要拿起来看一看，立刻就能知道这块被埋藏了万年以上的玉简里到底记录着什么东西。

The dark crowd of people was comprised at least four, five hundred people. Hu Village very rarely had visitors, so all of them were stretching, trying to catch a glimpse of the person who was buying magic herbs.

The black robed man did not reply, and just as he was about to leave, he suddenly stopped and looked back at Weng Gong, "You are just an ordinary person. Why were the people in Immortal Jade City (玉仙城) looking for you?"

The Dragon Clan was situated at the Dragon Island (龙岛). The range of its forces were not as large as the Demon Phoenix Clan, therefore the Dragon Island belonged to the type where entry and exit was restricted. The majority of the members of the Dragon Clan were living on the Dragon Island.

A dragon's blood essence was the equivalent of a marvelous supplementary pill. Not only could it improve one's cultivation, it could also increase the strength of the body. Yet, the most important thing was that it could enhance the grade of a magic pill.
